components.camera

Interface Camera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraComponent, FreeCameraComponent

    public interface Camera
extends IComponent
    Base interface for Components with camera features.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Camera.CornerPoint
      One of the camera frustum's corner points.
      static class  Camera.ProjectionMode
      The camera can work in one of the following projection modes: perspective or orthographic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.joml.Vector3f getFrustumCenter()
      Returns the frustum's center point.
      org.joml.Vector3f getFrustumCornerPoint(Camera.CornerPoint cornerPoint)
      Returns the frustum's specified corner point.
      java.util.List<org.joml.Vector3f> getFrustumCornerPoints()
      Returns the frustum's corner points.
      org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()
      Returns the projection matrix.
      org.joml.Matrix4f getViewMatrix()
      Returns the view matrix.
      boolean isInsideFrustum(org.joml.Vector3f position, float radius)
      Returns true if the sphere (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside.
      boolean isInsideFrustum(org.joml.Vector3f aabbMin, org.joml.Vector3f aabbMax)
      Returns true if the axis alligned bounding box (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside.

      • isInsideFrustum

        boolean isInsideFrustum(org.joml.Vector3f position,
                        float radius)
        Returns true if the sphere (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside.
        Parameters:
        position - position
        radius - radius
        Returns:
        false if the sphere is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise

      • isInsideFrustum

        boolean isInsideFrustum(org.joml.Vector3f aabbMin,
                        org.joml.Vector3f aabbMax)
        Returns true if the axis alligned bounding box (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside.
        Parameters:
        aabbMin - the axis alligned bounding box's minimum x, y and z values
        aabbMax - the axis alligned bounding box's maximum x, y and z values
        Returns:
        false if the bounding box is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise
